entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Sunday 19 March 2023
